## üîß Configuration Basics

Bodh uses YAML files to configure presentations. Create a `bodh.yml` file in your project directory to customize themes, layouts, and features.

## üìù Basic Configuration

### Simple Setup
```yaml
theme: modern
font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 20
slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current/total"
```

### Corporate Branding
```yaml
theme: minimal
font:
  family: "Source Sans Pro"
  size: 18

logo:
  source: "company-logo.png"
  location: "top-right"
  size: 120

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current"
  position: "bottom-right"

navigation:
  show_dots: false
  show_progress: true
```

## üé® Advanced Styling

### Title Rules and Bullets
```yaml
theme: metropolis
style:
  hrule:
    enabled: true
    width: "80%"
    thickness: "2px"
    style: "solid"
    color: "accent"
  
  bullets:
    style: "arrow"
    color: "accent"
    size: "1.2em"

font:
  family: "Fira Sans"
  size: 22
```

### Multi-Column Layouts
```yaml
theme: modern
layout:
  columns: 2
  column_gap: "3rem"
  alignment: "left"

style:
  slide_padding: "2rem 3rem"
  element_margin: "1rem"
```

## üé¨ Interactive Features

### Overlay System
```yaml
theme: gradient
overlays:
  enabled: true
  transition: "fade"
  duration: "0.5s"

navigation:
  enabled: true
  show_arrows: true
  show_dots: true
  keyboard_shortcuts: true
```

### Custom Navigation
```yaml
theme: dark
navigation:
  enabled: true
  show_arrows: false
  show_dots: true
  show_progress: true

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "percent"
  position: "bottom-center"
```

## üìä Real-World Examples

### Academic Presentation
```yaml
# academic.yml - For research presentations
theme: metropolis
font:
  family: "Fira Sans"
  size: 18

style:
  hrule:
    enabled: true
    width: "70%"
    style: "solid"
  bullets:
    style: "default"
    color: "primary"

layout:
  columns: 1
  alignment: "left"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current/total"

navigation:
  show_dots: false
  show_progress: false
```

### Tech Conference Talk  
```yaml
# tech-talk.yml - For developer presentations
theme: dark
font:
  family: "Fira Code"
  size: 16

logo:
  source: "tech-logo.svg"
  location: "bottom-right"
  size: 80

style:
  shadows: true
  rounded_corners: true
  bullets:
    style: "arrow"
    color: "accent"

overlays:
  enabled: true
  transition: "slide"

navigation:
  show_progress: true
  keyboard_shortcuts: true
```

### Corporate Pitch
```yaml
# corporate.yml - For business presentations  
theme: modern
font:
  family: "Inter"
  size: 20

logo:
  source: "company-logo.png"
  location: "top-left"
  size: 150

style:
  shadows: false
  rounded_corners: false
  hrule:
    enabled: false
  bullets:
    style: "circle"
    color: "primary"

slide_number:
  enabled: true
  format: "current"
  position: "bottom-right"

navigation:
  show_dots: false
  show_arrows: true
```

### Design Portfolio
```yaml
# portfolio.yml - For creative presentations
theme: minimal
font:
  family: "Source Sans Pro"
  size: 24

style:
  slide_padding: "4rem"
  element_margin: "2rem"
  shadows: false
```

### Educational Content

```yaml
navigation:
  enabled: true
  show_progress: true
  keyboard_shortcuts: true

slide_number:
  enabled: true
```

## üéØ Configuration Tips

### Performance Optimization
```yaml
# Fast rendering for development
style:
  animations: false
  shadows: false
  rounded_corners: false

# High quality for final export  
style:
  animations: true
  shadows: true
  rounded_corners: true
```

### Accessibility
```yaml
# High contrast for better readability
theme: dark  # or minimal
font:
  size: 24   # Larger text

style:
  bullets:
    size: "1.5em"  # Larger bullets
    
navigation:
  keyboard_shortcuts: true  # Always enable
```

### Print Optimization
```yaml
# Optimized for PDF export
theme: minimal
style:
  shadows: false      # Avoid printing issues
  animations: false   # Not needed in PDF
  
layout:
  alignment: "left"   # Better for reading

slide_number:
  enabled: true       # Helpful in printed form
  format: "current/total"
```

## üìÅ File Organization

### Project Structure
```
my-presentation/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ bodh.yml           # Main configuration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ slides.md          # Presentation content
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ images/            # Image assets
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ logo.png
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ charts/
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ configs/           # Alternative configs
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ dark-theme.yml
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ print-ready.yml
```

### Multiple Configurations
```bash
# Use different configs for different outputs
python bodh.py slides.md -c configs/web-preview.yml --html
python bodh.py slides.md -c configs/print-ready.yml -o final.pdf
```

## üîç Validation and Testing

Bodh automatically validates your configuration and provides helpful error messages:

```bash
# Test configuration
python bodh.py --config bodh.yml --validate-only

# Common validation errors:
# - Invalid theme names
# - Font sizes out of range (8-72px)
# - Invalid color formats
# - Missing logo files
```
